title: Flatpack fear no more? Robot assembles IKEA chair frame
text:
Flatpack fear no more? Robot assembles IKEA chair frame 10:01pm IST - 01:25 
Robots in Singapore have completed a task many humans dread - assembling flat-packed IKEA furniture. Sifting through pages of instructions and a jumble of screws and bolts to build the low-cost Swedish furniture may soon be a thing of the past given advances in technology, say researchers at the city-state's Nanyang Technological University. Sonia Legg reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
